name: Short Stories (GamerJames, Flinn Fraher, LawLewis)
description:
A game about traversing between different books, being thrown into the middle of the story and attempting to solve puzzles and overcome challenges in order to become the hero.

This game was made within the span of 1 week, for the "Summer Slow Jams August 2021: Cliffhanger" Game Jam. https://itch.io/jam/ssjcliffhanger

As the player progresses they will develop their character as they gain memories from the stories.  This was our interpretation of the creative theme "This isn't even my final form" from the game jam.

Credits:

James Bell - https://gamerjames.itch.io/

Steven Lewis - https://lawlewis.itch.io/

Flinn Fraher - https://flinnf.itch.io/

Made in UE4

Asset packs from Synty Studios

Sounds from Freesound.org
